message.content:
cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.CE, cs.RO 

The paper presents a data-driven control approach using reinforcement learning for building climate control. This work involves the application of machine learning techniques to control a physical system, which falls under the category of machine learning and control engineering. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper deals with the control of a physical system, which can be categorized under cs.SY (Systems and Control). The use of reinforcement learning and artificial neural networks also suggests the sub-categories cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science). Finally, the paper involves the use of simulation and experimental analysis, which can be categorized under cs.RO (Robotics).
